attributes.title: No 💜
attributes.review: Literally made it to where my phone would glitch and allowing me to make phone calls. Also keep making my text messages have “Trump 2020, Make America Great Again” at the end without my consent. Led to me getting jumped and expelled from school😭😭

attributes.title: Trump is a rapist
attributes.review: I hate this app it won’t let me vote for him because I’m Mexican and that’s just rude disgusting and trump is a rapist this man should not me our president his a racist and he said to us Mexicans and Blacks go back to our countries so we will take our culture back and he locks up Mexican kids in cages because he’s racist

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded it so I could stay up to date on all the awesome rallies our president is hosting, but the app was crashing, glitching, asking super personal information, and harassing me to donate and pay to upgrade my seating! This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded, don’t waste your time with it!!!!

attributes.title: Peepeemandoingbadthings
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our gracious leader in office and keep up to date on his extraordinary campaign. Then I realized this dude is kinda the worst. The second the app finished downloading, my mom walks in and tells me she’s leaving my dad. Thanks Trump, you ruined my parents’ marriage >:(

attributes.title: So racist my phone nearly died
attributes.review: I’ve had this app on my phone for less than a minute, and already my phone is struggling under the weight of the racism, misogyny, homophobia, and hypocrisy that this app brings with it. If there was a way to give it zero stars I would

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible. Do not wast your time here.
attributes.review: This app is absolutely garbage. not only does it not work, but when i open it i see so much false information. This app should be taken off the app store. Not to mention the child pornography portrayed by the name on the app. So bad. Trump🧚no😌

attributes.title: Oh oh Stinky
attributes.review: When I first opened the app, my whole house smelled like stale Cheetos and stanky oranges!! I closed the app and everything smelled so much better. I recommend you delete the app if you haven’t already and make the world a better place my deleting Donald out of this world too

attributes.title: Trump 2020 🙈🧚💫 but on a grave 🌈✨
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I was thinking it was the perfect way to support a misogynistic, homophobic, and racist President. 🧚😌 But what I tried opening up the app it just showed a picture of a really huge Cheeto puff. I was extremely confused and had to give this a one star review. 💫

attributes.title: yeah no❤️
attributes.review: i had downloaded this app to support mr bunker boy and was horrified by what i saw!!!! an orange ball sack on my screen asking me to support him and his campaign😖😖😖😖 i DO NOT recommend this app for any one with even the slightest amount of  common sense and it’s DEFINITELY not suitable for children. pls remove this app from appstore i am forever scarred!!!!!!!!😟😟

I opened the app to see the Cheeto man in action and my dog took a quick glance at the phone and he went into a coma !!!!! The vet said that something terrifying must’ve induced him to go into shock and now he’s in a coma. They’re saying that my dog got so scare that he might never be able to walk again. IF YOU GUYS CARE FOR YOUR FURRY ANIMALS DONT DOWNLOAD THHIS APP!!!!!!!
